replies.msg:
各位海外嘅巴絲，唔係眼白白睇住香港嘅手足畀人打呀
遠在世界各地嘅我地冇辦法同喺香港嘅人一齊罷工罷課罷市，但我地可以做嘅係同身邊嘅外國講解香港發生緊咩事
由今日開始我地將會帶上白絲帶，喻意香港正係活喺白色恐佈之下，全世界嘅香港人係時候為我地嘅家行動
69之後一連三日，無論係social media post白絲，定係寫信去大使館，政府部門，甚至出嚟集會都好
6月12係最關鍵嘅一日，我地要發出更大嘅聲音，一齊施加壓力俾港共政府，無論用咩方式都好，都要盡全力阻止法案通過
希望大家可以齊心合力畀全世界人睇，香港人唔係淨係得離地撚同港豬，我地有嘅係捍衛自由嘅決心同勇氣

replies.msg:
【🇭🇰No to Hong Kong Extradition Law Amendment】
#反對修訂逃犯條例 #antielab

Q: What’s going on?
A: A proposed fugitive offender ordinance, or the so-called “Extradition (Amendment) Bill”, is currently pending in Legislative Council of Hong Kong and due for second reading on June 12, 2019. This bill will grant the non-democratically-elected Chief Executive of Hong Kong the authority to issue surrender order to fugitives of 37 legal offenses, and allow the reciprocal transfer of fugitives with 🇨🇳mainland China, 🇹🇼 Taiwan, and 🇲🇴 Macau under special surrender agreements for the first time.

Q: Why the fuck should I care?
A: Once the bill is passed, anyone in Hong Kong, including tourists, could be arrested and tried in court (or simply imprisoned) in CHINA. Think there’d be fair public trial, access to legal representation and a cool, 5-star prison waiting for you? 🤔

Q: Wait hold on, I thought it’s just a law for fugitives! I’m just a good, law-abiding citizen/a tourist who wants to take photos of night market and night view!
A: I know, but guess what, CHINA doesn’t actually care! China says you’re a fugitive, you’re a fugitive!

Cont

外國既爸絲都有好多野可以做

可以將香港既資訊散播到自己既所在國

將唔同post翻譯到不同既語言去話俾更多既人知

Q: No fucking way la, it’s not like China is Russia or something... There’s due process of law in Hong Kong ah?
A: Wow what a gorgeous world you must be living in. To answer to your first question, I suggest you to google “human rights in China” (wiki it!)

To your second question:
1. Lack of full legislative scrutiny: This bill has been fast-tracked in Legislative Council, aka the mouthpiece of Beijing government.

2. Court’s gatekeeping ability in doubt: While there’d be committal hearing held by the court in Hong Kong, the court is not given power to review the validity of evidence. All you need is a prima facie evidence that you don’t need to prove it’s irrefutable!

3. No human rights protection clauses in the bill: Instead, Secretary for Security John Lee says he’s “confident that Chinese authorities would keep their promises of not violating basic human rights”.

4. Taiwan refused to enter the agreement: Quick background story: the whole thing wouldn’t even exist if a Hong Kong dude didn’t murder (allegedly...) his girlfriend in Taiwan last year. This dude fled back to Hong Kong, where there’s no mutual assistance/fugitive transfer agreement with Taiwan. Taiwanese government has refused to establish any agreement with Hong Kong under the current proposal. So what’s the point then?

P.s. i can’t count how many countries/business associations have voiced their concerns/démarche to this bill...

Q: Okay, then what can I do now to contribute?
A:
1. Join overseas protests
2. Watch and share this YouTube video: https://youtu.be/qadY2QMogVM
3. Post on social media with the hashtag #antielab #noextraditiontochina #antiextradtionlaw
4. Urge the White House to respond to the petition
5. Raise awareness with whatever you could (join white ribbon movement!)

Hong Kong is not China but a city with rule of law
Please support the ongoing battle in Hong Kong

Sources:
1. Wikipedia
2. Observations of the Hong Kong Bar Association
3. Joint Statement by the Nordic Chambers to Extradition Bill
4. HKU Faculty if Law Professor Johannes Chan

［緊急提示］
🙏🏻真心唔該發岀去，好多人唔知三讀係同一日

恢復二讀辯論和三讀(若法案獲得二讀通過)，通常會在同一次立法會會議進行。

法案如通過首讀、二讀及三讀程序，便獲制定成為法例。除非法案訂明較後的生效日期，否則有關法例經行政長官簽署並在憲報刊登後便可生效。

學校secret批緊

各位海外嘅巴絲，唔係眼白白睇住香港嘅手足畀人打呀
遠在世界各地嘅我地冇辦法同喺香港嘅人一齊罷工罷課罷市，但我地可以做嘅係同身邊嘅外國講解香港發生緊咩事
由今日開始我地將會帶上白絲帶，喻意香港正係活喺白色恐佈之下，全世界嘅香港人係時候為我地嘅家行動
69之後一連三日，無論係social media post白絲，定係寫信去大使館，政府部門，甚至出嚟集會都好
6月12係最關鍵嘅一日，我地要發出更大嘅聲音，一齊施加壓力俾港共政府，無論用咩方式都好，都要盡全力阻止法案通過
希望大家可以齊心合力畀全世界人睇，香港人唔係淨係得離地撚同港豬，我地有嘅係捍衛自由嘅決心同勇氣

幫拖Trend緊嘅hashtag: #antiELAB #noextraditiontochina #antiextraditionlaw #savehk
將你戴白絲帶嘅照po上social media後tag#whiteribbonmovement
